external_games.name: Mr. Catfish's Singles Retreat Event Extravaganza!!!

name: Mr. Catfish's Singles Retreat Event Extravaganza!!!
summary:
You - a robot named A13X - are invited to the exclusive romantic getaway run by Mr. Catfish. Here, will you find the meaning of true love, or will your dates be murdered before a connection can be made?

Choose from exciting dates such as Pythagoras the triangle, Hoover the vacuum, and... Sam the human!

Can YOU find all the secret endings??

This game was created by Seven Girl Games for the University of Alberta's Game Development Certificate.
